TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScriptManagerProxy extends System.Web.UI.Control

summary.span: 当已在父元素中定义 控件时，使嵌套组件（如内容页和用户控件）可以将脚本和服务引用添加到页中。

span.span: Enables nested components such as content pages and user controls to add script and service references to pages when a control is already defined in a parent element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction Web 页只能包含一个控制，直接在页上或在嵌套间接或父组件。A Web page can contain only one control, either directly on the page or indirectly inside a nested or parent component. 控件，你将添加脚本和服务到内容页和用户控件如果宿主页面的母版页中已包含控件。The control lets you add scripts and services to content pages and to user controls if the master page or host page already contains a control. 当你使用控件，您可以将添加到由定义的脚本和服务集合控件。When you use the control, you can add to the script and service collections defined by the control. 如果您不想要包括特定的脚本和包含特定的每个页上的服务控件，您可以将其删除从控件。If you do not want to include specific scripts and services on every page that includes a particular control, you can remove them from the control. 你可以然后将它们添加到各个页面使用改为控制。You can then add them to individual pages by using the control instead. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ```

span.span: ASP.NET Master Pages Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含的页面控件还必须包含有效控件。A page that contains a control must also contain a valid control. 例如，如果你将内容页，页面上的控件必须引用包含母版页控件。For example, if you are putting a control on a content page, the page must reference a master page that contains a control.

span.span: There is no for the current page.
\- or -
The current page is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AuthenticationService As AuthenticationServiceManager

summary.span: 获取与当前 实例关联的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object that is associated with the current instance.

value.span: 当前 实例的 对象。

span.span: The object for the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的对象表示向该页面注册的身份验证服务。The object that is returned by this property represents the authentication service that is registered with the page. 可以使用 ASP.NET 身份验证服务，也可以使用自定义身份验证服务。You can use the ASP.NET authentication service or use a custom authentication service. 若要使用自定义服务，则可以通过注册包括`AuthenticationService`元素内的`ScriptManagerProxy`页上的元素。To use a custom service, you can register it by including a `AuthenticationService` element inside the `ScriptManagerProxy` element on the page. 你可以以编程方式配置对象。You can also programmatically configure the object.

public: property System::Web::UI::CompositeScriptReference ^ CompositeScript { System::Web::UI::CompositeScriptReference ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取对支持内容页的复合脚本的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the composite script that supports the content page.
A reference to the composite script.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Navigate As EventHandler(Of HistoryEventArgs)

summary.span: 当用户点击浏览器的“后退”或“前进”按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks the browser's **Back** or **Forward** button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击浏览器的**回**按钮，浏览器将导航到以前查看过的 Url，其中包括包含历史时间点的状态数据的 Url。When a user clicks the browser's **Back** button, the browser navigates through previously-viewed URLs, which can include URLs that contain history-point state data. 如果在网页中的客户端代码检测到此 URL 包含历史记录状态数据，它向服务器页发出请求。If client code in the Web page detects that the URL contains history state data, it makes a request to the server page. 这相当于为回发事件，并服务器控件将引发`Navigate`事件。This acts as a postback event, and the server control raises the `Navigate` event. 可以处理此事件，并重新创建与事件使用传递的状态数据根据需要在 Web 应用程序中的页。You can handle this event and re-create the page as required in the Web application by using the state data that is passed with the event.

summary.span: 获取与当前 实例关联的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object that is associated with the current instance.

value.span: 当前 实例的 对象。

span.span: The object for the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的对象表示向该页面注册配置文件服务。The object that is returned by this property represents the profile service that is registered with the page. 可以使用 ASP.NET 配置文件服务，也可以使用自定义配置文件服务。You can use the ASP.NET profile service or use a custom profile service. 若要使用自定义服务，则可以通过注册包括`ProfileService`元素内的`ScriptManagerProxy`页上的元素。To use a custom service, you can register it by including a `ProfileService` element inside the `ScriptManagerProxy` element on the page. 你可以以编程方式配置对象。You can also programmatically configure the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的对象表示向该页面注册角色服务。The object that is returned by this property represents the role service that is registered with the page. 可以使用 ASP.NET 角色服务，也可以使用自定义的角色服务。You can use the ASP.NET role service or use a custom role service. 若要使用自定义服务，则可以通过注册包括`RoleService`元素内的`ScriptManagerProxy`页上的元素。To use a custom service, you can register it by including a `RoleService` element inside the `ScriptManagerProxy` element on the page. 你可以以编程方式配置对象。You can also programmatically configure the object.

related.span: 将角色信息用于 ASP.NET AJAX

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Scripts As ScriptReferenceCollection

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，该对象包含显式注册到 控件的每个脚本文件的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that contains a object for each script file that is explicitly registered with the control.

value.span: 一个集合，其中包含 控件发送到浏览器的每个脚本文件的 对象。

span.span: A collection of objects for each script file that the control sends to the browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合，可添加到已注册到任何脚本的脚本引用控件。The collection enables you to add script references to any scripts that are already registered with the control. 您可以将脚本引用添加到以声明方式使用集合`ScriptReference`元素。You can add script references to the collection declaratively by using the `ScriptReference` element. 您可以通过添加以编程方式添加脚本引用对象添加到集合。You can add script references programmatically by adding objects to the collection. 如果脚本已注册到或控件，该脚本将不会再注册。If a script is already registered with the or control, the script is not registered again.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Services As ServiceReferenceCollection

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，该对象包含显式注册到 控件的每个服务的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that contains a object for each service that is explicitly registered with the control.

value.span: 一个集合，其中包含注册到 控件的每个服务的 对象。

span.span: A collection that contains an object for each service that is registered with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合，可将服务添加到已注册到任何服务控件。The collection enables you to add services to any services that are already registered with the control. 您可以将服务引用添加到以声明方式使用集合`ServiceReference`元素。You can add service references to the collection declaratively by using the `ServiceReference` element. 您可以通过添加以编程方式添加服务引用对象添加到集合。You can add service references programmatically by adding objects to the collection. 如果服务已注册到或控件，该服务不会再注册。If a service is already registered with the or control, the service is not registered again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中重写属性类可以禁止设置此属性。The property is overridden in the class to prevent setting this property. 属性返回`true`除非它是在容器中，如其属性设置为`false`。The property returns `true` unless it is inside a container, such as a whose property is set to `false`.
